title: Doom
notes: Mouse is slightly wonky, but excellent otherwise. Perfectly playable.

title: NieR: Automata
notes: Had to create "My Documents" folder in ~/.local/share/Steam/SteamApps/compatdata/524220/pfx/dosdevices/c:/users/steamuser in order to hold settings and saves. Also had to add "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" into launch options, otherwise, some objects and enemies blinks. Experimented some slowdowns (20fps) when in big areas.

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: Minor occasional stuttering

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: Won't launch, immediately get a "The server is not reachable, check your Internet connection and click 'Retry'" error.

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: Using Proton 3.7-4 beta, the game is in a playable state. At 1440p, I can stay at 45 fps + on a mix of high/medium settings. It only drops in very intense fights, but this probably has to do more with the port itself.

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: It works okay. A bit on the sluggish side, and the graphics settings are a bit glitchy and can cause the game to crash. Change them on the title screen to avoid most issues.

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: Need to install the latest Mesa 18.3.0 drivers as the current standard drivers in Ubuntu lead to "No Graphic Memory".

title: NieR:Automata™
notes: worse performance than on windows / characters talking to you over the radio causes an irritating flash that blocks the view
Stable 30 fps in high settings.
title: NieR:Automata™

notes: Performance seems in line with the Windows version without FAR mod installed. No major graphical errors observed, locked at 30 fps.
title: NieR:Automata™

notes: Played whole "intro-game" (before reaching the base) without any problem.  Works both  on  PC and throught Steam Link. Steam controller  worked just fine.
title: NieR:Automata™

notes: No issues after 90 minutes of play time.
title: NieR:Automata™

notes: Hangs in the opening cutscene. Able to pause, but no other input does anything. Music stops, killing process crashes system.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon HD 7900 Series (TAHITI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)

title: NieR:Automata™

notes: Runs very well and does not crash. To improve performance further use the latest version of DXVK ( at the time of posting 0.80) but is not needed and runs well without.
title: NieR:Automata™

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Mostly stable 60 FPS on 1080p without MSAA. LLVM 7 or 8 required, 6.0 is known to cause hangs.

title: NieR:Automata™

notes: Performance is comparable to the windows version but since the windows version also performs badly, you'll have to downgrade your graphics settings accordingly. FAR Mod which gave a performance boost under windows does not work via proton.

notes: Crash on start, "no graphic memory"
title: NieR:Automata™

notes: slight performance drop compared to win, downgrading the AA and texture filter to Off helped a lot.

notes: Game runs with significantly lower performance than Windows(~26-45fps on high graphics, 40-50fps on low). FAR mod does not seem to function.
